name: dvd.screen
description:
this is a. . . bad game. this so called 'game' is made for idle purposes people like, it was made so you could remember those old DVD screen things. this project isn't even a game, WHY AM I UPDATING THIS??

the project was never meant to be, it took me like 59 minutes to make it (see how i didn't use hour?"

idk how this game works in mac so please don't sue me itch
